price: Basi bila ya shaka mtaiona Jahannamu!
footnotes: Nakuapieni na nakutilieni mkazo, enyi watu, kwamba hakika nyinyi mtakuja ushuhudia Moto unao waka.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
